text: @SenWarren While Speaker Pelosi was on TV and social media showing off her $13 a pint icecream and her refrigerator/freezer that cost as much as some worker's cars the Small Businesses COVID-19 Relief run out if money. Workers say thanks to Speaker Pelosi if you don't have a job to go to
